description: The Coding Agent is structured around a clear separation of concerns, facilitating a robust and extensible design. The CLI_Application serves as the primary user interface, handling input/output and orchestrating the agent's lifecycle. At its core, the Agent_Core implements the ReACT pattern, intelligently processing user requests, making decisions, and coordinating actions. It leverages the LLM_Interface to communicate with the underlying Large Language Model and utilizes FileSystem_Tools for interacting with the local file system. All components rely on the Configuration_Manager for centralized access to application settings and sensitive information, ensuring consistent behavior and secure operation. This modular design promotes maintainability and allows for independent evolution of each component.

components.name: CLI_Application
components.description: The user-facing interface, responsible for parsing command-line arguments, managing the input/output loop, and displaying agent responses. It acts as the orchestrator for the agent's lifecycle.

components.name: Agent_Core
components.description: The intelligent core of the application, implementing the ReACT (Reasoning and Acting) pattern. It interprets user requests, decides on actions, interacts with the LLM for reasoning, and invokes appropriate tools.

components.name: LLM_Interface
components.description: Provides an abstraction layer for communication with the Large Language Model. It handles sending prompts and receiving structured responses, abstracting away the specifics of the LLM provider.

components.name: FileSystem_Tools
components.description: A dedicated module offering functionalities for the agent to interact with the local file system. This includes reading existing files and writing new content.

components.name: Configuration_Manager
components.description: Centralizes the management of application settings, environment variables, and sensitive information like API keys. It ensures that various components can access necessary configurations.
